price: (Musa) aravuga ati “Allah nabishaka uzasanga nihangana, kandi sinzigera nigomeka ku mabwiriza yawe.”
arabic: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرٗا وَلَآ أَعۡصِي لَكَ أَمۡرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla satajidunī in shāa al-lahu ṣābiran walā aʿṣī laka amran
